description: React ErrorBoundary component that catches runtime errors in the component tree and displays a user-friendly fallback UI.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component that captures runtime errors in its child component tree and renders a fallback UI.

methods.name: getDerivedStateFromError(error)
methods.description: Updates state to indicate an error has occurred when an error is thrown.

methods.name: componentDidCatch(error, info)
methods.description: Logs error information and updates state with additional info.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets error state and optionally calls a reset callback passed via props.

methods.name: render()
methods.description: Renders children if no error, otherwise displays fallback UI with error details.
